This is my new favorite tank top. I’m a 32DD-DDD and this shirt hold everything so nicely. The material is super soft and and good quality. It’s double layered so it’s not see through at all. I have it in white and black and it’s not see through whatsoever. They are a bit pricey, but I found it to be worth the money. It’s also a pretty long tank top. such a skin dupe! love the skin fit. giving off one star bc there was a rip in the inside seam but overall love and will buy more! not cheap product

评论概述: Used to fit like skims now they’re super big
评论详情: I bought a couple of these back in September and loved them. They fit perfectly, super tight and compressing like skims. I recently ordered a few more colors and the sizing has completely changed. They are way bigger now to the point where they just don’t fit. I have always ordered xs in every item. You can visibly see the sizing difference when I hold up the tank tops I bought in September vs now. I have no idea why they changed their sizing but if you are a size 2 or smaller these are not going to be a skims dupe. Really disappointing because I loved these shirts, I wish I would have bought all of them before they changed the sizing. Don’t bother buying now.

As others have stated it’s double layered.  However I’ll need to wear nipple covers for sure.  I love them so much,  I plan on buying more.  I had gained some weight over the holidays,  I purchased the large.  I’m a 34 F in bra size, my chest measures at 38 1/2.  I think I could downsize to medium, but I may stick with a large bc my mid section measures at 29 1/2. A must have top for spring and summer.

I bought two of these tanks for layering and they are so soft and amazing! They remind me of the wundermost nulu tanks. I don’t like to wear a bra if I don’t have to so I usually wear the nulu tanks or a yoga bra tank under everything. These will fit nicely in rotation with my other tanks. I plan on buying other colors!
i did not recieve this. I love it so much so I ordered another one for my other daughter, but it never came.

I love this tank so much, I wanna buy it in every color. It's super comfy and also amazing quality, I also love that it's stretchy. I get compliments every time I wear this and my best friend is constantly asking me to borrow it.

This tank has been on repeat-the color, fit, and quality is absolutely insane. Especially for the price-I own every color of these tanks because they are so flattering and you don’t need a bra. Not see through at all, and it washes great without fading or balling up. Absolutely love.

This top is so cute and flattering. It's not see-through at all (I bought it in brown and light blue). I would size down if you want a tighter fit. The material is stretchy and has held up well in the wash- I've washed it 2-3x so far and seen no wear and tear. For the price it's a great deal.
this top I love it. It fits perfectly and I have a larger bust so I was nervous that it wasn’t going to look right but I love I can wear it with no bra full support 10 out of 10 recommend

评论概述: Not a good or comfortable fit
评论详情: This tank runs small, I usually wear an XS in all my tops, this fits a little tighter than I was hoping. The cut is strange, the straps are very far over on the side and dig into my arms. The only nice thing I can say about it is the fabric is soft.

I love this tank! Snatches you in and the fabric is double lined, buttery soft. I don’t wear a bra with this (I’m a true M - 36C) and it keeps the girls in place. It does look cropped when you take it out of the packaging but once you put it on you can move it up or down to your preferred length and it’ll stay. Skims dupe fr! Great basic to have in your closet.

The material is very stretchy and thin. It’s a good workout tank or lounging. i recommend wearing a super seamless bra tho otherwise you’ll see every wrinkle in the bra through the shirt. Also, the straps are a little bit far apart for my liking. The kind of go into my armpits a bit and can be uncomfortable because they are so far apart, but the shirt still fits well after a bit of adjusting. other than the straps, the color and material are both very nice
got it for layering and it’s really soft and comfortable! it does ride up on me but i’m also a little curvy so i expected that to happen but overall a great tank top!

This tank top is double lined and has adjustable straps. I got the black in a xs and I can wear it without a bra no problem! Fits true to size, but if you want it a little bit longer, I would size up one so that it won’t roll up because I do find myself pulling it down every so often when I wear low rise.
It’s nice quality but keeps rolling up because of the material. I got an xs because I like my tank tops tight, but because of that it just rolls and will not stay down.
the most flattering top their is! highly recommend. I am 105 lbs and I found that a size small fits me perfectly. the cutest going out top
